content: उद्ग्रंथ् {c1c} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To bind up, tie into bundles. {@--2@} To tie up, put or sew together (as garlands &c.); इयमुद्ग्रथते स्रजो विचित्राः <ls>Mu. 1. 4</ls>; tie or fasten, intertwine; लताप्रतानोद्ग्रथितैः स केशैः <ls>R. 2. 8.</ls> {@--3@} To unbind, loosen (as a knot &c.); <ls>Śi. 10. 63.</ls>
